Now let's create the API interface that will define the REST API endpoints:"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01Kow4sKWJb9NUguaujSPR2o","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/java/com/northcoders/jvevents/api/ApiService.java", "instructions": "Create ApiService interface for defining API endpoints", "code_edit": "package com.northcoders.jvevents.api;\n\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeRegistration;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeResponse;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Badge;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventResponse;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.RegistrationResponse;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\nimport retrofit2.Call;\nimport retrofit2.http.Body;\nimport retrofit2.http.GET;\nimport retrofit2.http.POST;\nimport retrofit2.http.Path;\n\npublic interface ApiService {\n\n // Get all events\n @GET(\"events\")\n Call<List<Event>> getEvents();\n\n // Get a specific event by ID\n @GET(\"events/{eventId}\")\n Call<EventResponse> getEventById(@Path(\"eventId\") String eventId);\n\n // Get attendees for an event\n @GET(\"events/{eventId}/attendees\")\n Call<List<AttendeeResponse>> getEventAttendees(@Path(\"eventId\") String eventId);\n\n // Register for an event\n @POST(\"events/{eventId}/attendees\")\n Call<RegistrationResponse> registerForEvent(\n @Path(\"eventId\") String eventId, \n @Body AttendeeRegistration registration);\n\n // Get attendee badge\n @GET(\"attendees/{attendeeId}/badge\")\n Call<Badge> getAttendeeBadge(@Path(\"attendeeId\") String attendeeId);\n\n // Check-in attendee\n @GET(\"attendees/{attendeeId}/check-in\")\n Call<Void> checkInAttendee(@Path(\"attendeeId\") String attendeeId);\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01Kow4sKWJb9NUguaujSPR2o","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,1 +1,45 @@
+package com.northcoders.jvevents.api;
 
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeRegistration;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeResponse;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Badge;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventResponse;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.RegistrationResponse;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+import retrofit2.Call;
+import retrofit2.http.Body;
+import retrofit2.http.GET;
+import retrofit2.http.POST;
+import retrofit2.http.Path;
+
+public interface ApiService {
+
+ // Get all events
+ @GET("events")
+ Call<List<Event>> getEvents();
+
+ // Get a specific event by ID
+ @GET("events/{eventId}")
+ Call<EventResponse> getEventById(@Path("eventId") String eventId);
+
+ // Get attendees for an event
+ @GET("events/{eventId}/attendees")
+ Call<List<AttendeeResponse>> getEventAttendees(@Path("eventId") String eventId);
+
+ // Register for an event
+ @POST("events/{eventId}/attendees")
+ Call<RegistrationResponse> registerForEvent(
+ @Path("eventId") String eventId,
+ @Body AttendeeRegistration registration);
+
+ // Get attendee badge
+ @GET("attendees/{attendeeId}/badge")
+ Call<Badge> getAttendeeBadge(@Path("attendeeId") String attendeeId);
+
+ // Check-in attendee
+ @GET("attendees/{attendeeId}/check-in")
+ Call<Void> checkInAttendee(@Path("attendeeId") String attendeeId);
+}
```

.putExtra(CalendarContract.Events.TITLE, event.getTitle())\n .putExtra(CalendarContract.Events.DESCRIPTION, event.getDetails())\n .putExtra(CalendarContract.EXTRA_EVENT_BEGIN_TIME, startTimeMillis)\n now\n long startTime = cal.getTimeInMillis();\n // Event duration of 2 hours\n cal.add(Calendar.HOUR, 2);\n long endTime = cal.getTimeInMillis();\n \n addEventToCalendar(context, event, startTime, @@ -1,1 +1,53 @@
+package com.northcoders.jvevents.util;
 
+import android.content.Context;
+import android.content.Intent;
+import android.provider.CalendarContract;
+import android.widget.Toast;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+
+import java.util.Calendar;
+
+public class CalendarUtils {
+
+ /**
+ * Adds an event to the user's calendar using calendar intent
+ *
+ * @param context the Android context
+ * @param event the event to add
+ * @param startTimeMillis the start time in milliseconds
+ * @param endTimeMillis the end time in milliseconds
+ */
+ public static void addEventToCalendar(Context context, Event event, long startTimeMillis, long endTimeMillis) {
+ Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_INSERT)
+ .setData(CalendarContract.Events.CONTENT_URI)
+ .putExtra(CalendarContract.Events.TITLE, event.getTitle())
+ .putExtra(CalendarContract.Events.DESCRIPTION, event.getDetails())
+ .putExtra(CalendarContract.EXTRA_EVENT_BEGIN_TIME, startTimeMillis)
+ .putExtra(CalendarContract.EXTRA_EVENT_END_TIME, endTimeMillis);
+
+ if (intent.resolveActivity(context.getPackageManager()) != null) {
+ context.startActivity(intent);
+ } else {
+ Toast.makeText(context, "No calendar app found", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Creates calendar event for the current day (useful for demo purposes)
+ *
+ * @param context the Android context
+ * @param event the event to add
+ */
+ public static void addEventToCalendarToday(Context context, Event event) {
+ Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();
+ // Set the event to start now
+ long startTime = cal.getTimeInMillis();
+ // Event duration of 2 hours
+ cal.add(Calendar.HOUR, 2);
+ long endTime = cal.getTimeInMillis();
+
+ addEventToCalendar(context, event, startTime, endTime);
+ }
+}
```

+package com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel;
 
+import android.util.Log;
+
+import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
+import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.api.ApiClient;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.api.ApiService;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeListResponse;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeRegistration;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeResponse;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventResponse;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.RegistrationResponse;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+
+import retrofit2.Call;
+import retrofit2.Callback;
+import retrofit2.Response;
+
+public class EventViewModel extends ViewModel {
+ private static final String TAG = "EventViewModel";
+
+ private final ApiService apiService;
+
+ // LiveData for events list
+ private final MutableLiveData<List<Event>> events = new MutableLiveData<>();
+ private final MutableLiveData<String> errorMessage = new MutableLiveData<>();
+ private final MutableLiveData<Event> selectedEvent = new MutableLiveData<>();
+ private final MutableLiveData<List<AttendeeResponse>> eventAttendees = new MutableLiveData<>();
+ private final MutableLiveData<String> registrationResult = new MutableLiveData<>();
+
+ public EventViewModel() {
+ apiService = ApiClient.getClient().create(ApiService.class);
+ events.setValue(new ArrayList<>());
+ eventAttendees.setValue(new ArrayList<>());
+ }
+
+ // Getter methods for LiveData
+ public LiveData<List<Event>> getEvents() {
+ return events;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<Event> getSelectedEvent() {
+ return selectedEvent;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<String> getErrorMessage() {
+ return errorMessage;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<List<AttendeeResponse>> getEventAttendees() {
+ return eventAttendees;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<String> getRegistrationResult() {
+ return registrationResult;
+ }
+
+ // Method to fetch all events
+ public void fetchEvents() {
+ apiService.getEvents().enqueue(new Callback<List<Event>>() {
+ @Override
+ public void onResponse(Call<List<Event>> call, Response<List<Event>> response) {
+ if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
+ events.setValue(response.body());
+ } else {
+ errorMessage.setValue("Failed to load events");
+ }
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onFailure(Call<List<Event>> call, Throwable t) {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching events", t);
+ errorMessage.setValue("Network error: " + t.getMessage());
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ // Method to fetch a specific event
+ public void fetchEventById(String eventId) {
+ apiService.getEventById(eventId).enqueue(new Callback<EventResponse>() {
+ @Override
+ public void onResponse(Call<EventResponse> call, Response<EventResponse> response) {
+ if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
+ selectedEvent.setValue(response.body().getEvent());
+ } else {
+ errorMessage.setValue("Failed to load event details");
+ }
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onFailure(Call<EventResponse> call, Throwable t) {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching event details", t);
+ errorMessage.setValue("Network error: " + t.getMessage());
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ // Method to fetch attendees for an event
+ public void fetchEventAttendees(String eventId) {
+ apiService.getEventAttendees(eventId).enqueue(new Callback<AttendeeListResponse>() {
+ @Override
+ public void onResponse(Call<AttendeeListResponse> call, Response<AttendeeListResponse> response) {
+ if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
+ eventAttendees.setValue(response.body().getAttendees());
+ } else {
+ errorMessage.setValue("Failed to load attendees");
+ }
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onFailure(Call<AttendeeListResponse> call, Throwable t) {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching attendees", t);
+ errorMessage.setValue("Network error: " + t.getMessage());
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ // Method to register for an event
+ public void registerForEvent(String eventId, String name, String email) {
+ AttendeeRegistration registration = new AttendeeRegistration(name, email);
+
+ apiService.registerForEvent(eventId, registration).enqueue(new Callback<RegistrationResponse>() {
+ @Override
+ public void onResponse(Call<RegistrationResponse> call, Response<RegistrationResponse> response) {
+ if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
+ registrationResult.setValue("Success! Your attendee ID is: " + response.body().getAttendeeId());
+ } else {
+ if (response.code() == 409) { // Conflict - already registered
+ registrationResult.setValue("You are already registered for this event");
+ } else if (response.code() == 422) { // Unprocessable entity - event full
+ registrationResult.setValue("This event is full");
+ } else {
+ registrationResult.setValue("Registration failed: " + response.message());
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onFailure(Call<RegistrationResponse> call, Throwable t) {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Error registering for event", t);
+ registrationResult.setValue("Network error: " + t.getMessage());
+ }
+ });
+ }
+}
```

MutableLiveData<>();\n private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> isLoading = new MutableLiveData<>(false);\n private final MutableLiveData<String> errorMessage = new MutableLiveData<>();\n \n public AuthViewModel(@NonNull Application application) {\n super(application);\n firebaseAuth = FirebaseAuth.getInstance();\n \n // Check if user is already logged in\n if (firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser() != null) {\n userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());\n }\n }\n \n // Getter methods for LiveData\n public LiveData<FirebaseUser> getUserLiveData() {\n return userLiveData;\n }\n \n public LiveData<Boolean> getIsLoading() {\n return isLoading;\n }\n \n public LiveData<String> getErrorMessage() {\n return errorMessage;\n }\n \n // Method to login with email and password\n public void login(String email, String password) {\n isLoading.setValue(true);\n \n firebaseAuth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email, password)\n .addOnCompleteListener(task -> {\n isLoading.setValue(false);\n if (task.isSuccessful()) {\n userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());\n } else {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Login failed\", task.getException());\n errorMessage.setValue(\"Authentication failed: \" + \n (task.getException() != null ? task.getException().getMessage() : \"Unknown error\"));\n }\n });\n }\n \n // Method to register a new staff account\n public void register(String email, String password) {\n isLoading.setValue(true);\n \n firebaseAuth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email, password)\n .addOnCompleteListener(task -> {\n isLoading.setValue(false);\n if (task.isSuccessful()) {\n userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());\n } else {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Registration failed\", task.getException());\n errorMessage.setValue(\"Registration failed: \" + \n (task.getException() != null ? task.getException().getMessage() : \"Unknown error\"));\n }\n });\n }\n \n // Method to log out\n public void logout() {\n firebaseAuth.signOut();\n userLiveData.setValue(null);\n }\n \n // Method to check if user is logged in\n public boolean isUserLoggedIn() {\n return firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser() != null;\n }\n}"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_01GvokN5sPMxzT8PM4nkNkuD","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

@@ -1,1 +1,89 @@
+package com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel;
 
+import android.app.Application;
+import android.util.Log;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel;
+import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
+import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
+
+import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth;
+import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUser;
+
+public class AuthViewModel extends AndroidViewModel {
+ private static final String TAG = "AuthViewModel";
+
+ private final FirebaseAuth firebaseAuth;
+ private final MutableLiveData<FirebaseUser> userLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
+ private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> isLoading = new MutableLiveData<>(false);
+ private final MutableLiveData<String> errorMessage = new MutableLiveData<>();
+
+ public AuthViewModel(@NonNull Application application) {
+ super(application);
+ firebaseAuth = FirebaseAuth.getInstance();
+
+ // Check if user is already logged in
+ if (firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser() != null) {
+ userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Getter methods for LiveData
+ public LiveData<FirebaseUser> getUserLiveData() {
+ return userLiveData;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<Boolean> getIsLoading() {
+ return isLoading;
+ }
+
+ public LiveData<String> getErrorMessage() {
+ return errorMessage;
+ }
+
+ // Method to login with email and password
+ public void login(String email, String password) {
+ isLoading.setValue(true);
+
+ firebaseAuth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email, password)
+ .addOnCompleteListener(task -> {
+ isLoading.setValue(false);
+ if (task.isSuccessful()) {
+ userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());
+ } else {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Login failed", task.getException());
+ errorMessage.setValue("Authentication failed: " +
+ (task.getException() != null ? task.getException().getMessage() : "Unknown error"));
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ // Method to register a new staff account
+ public void register(String email, String password) {
+ isLoading.setValue(true);
+
+ firebaseAuth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email, password)
+ .addOnCompleteListener(task -> {
+ isLoading.setValue(false);
+ if (task.isSuccessful()) {
+ userLiveData.setValue(firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser());
+ } else {
+ Log.e(TAG, "Registration failed", task.getException());
+ errorMessage.setValue("Registration failed: " +
+ (task.getException() != null ? task.getException().getMessage() : "Unknown error"));
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ // Method to log out
+ public void logout() {
+ firebaseAuth.signOut();
+ userLiveData.setValue(null);
+ }
+
+ // Method to check if user is logged in
+ public boolean isUserLoggedIn() {
+ return firebaseAuth.getCurrentUser() != null;
+ }
+}
```

androidx.annotation.NonNull;\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil;\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter;\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;\n\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.R;\nimport com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;\n\npublic class EventAdapter extends ListAdapter<Event, EventAdapter.EventViewHolder> {\n \n private final @@ -1,1 +1,82 @@
+package com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.adapter;
 
+import android.view.LayoutInflater;
+import android.view.View;
+import android.view.ViewGroup;
+import android.widget.TextView;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+
+public class EventAdapter extends ListAdapter<Event, EventAdapter.EventViewHolder> {
+
+ private final OnEventClickListener listener;
+
+ public EventAdapter(OnEventClickListener listener) {
+ super(DIFF_CALLBACK);
+ this.listener = listener;
+ }
+
+ private static final DiffUtil.ItemCallback<Event> DIFF_CALLBACK = new DiffUtil.ItemCallback<Event>() {
+ @Override
+ public boolean areItemsTheSame(@NonNull Event oldItem, @NonNull Event newItem) {
+ return oldItem.getId().equals(newItem.getId());
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public boolean areContentsTheSame(@NonNull Event oldItem, @NonNull Event newItem) {
+ return oldItem.getTitle().equals(newItem.getTitle()) &&
+ oldItem.getDetails().equals(newItem.getDetails()) &&
+ oldItem.getAttendeesAmount() == newItem.getAttendeesAmount();
+ }
+ };
+
+ @NonNull
+ @Override
+ public EventViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
+ View itemView = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext())
+ .inflate(R.layout.item_event, parent, false);
+ return new EventViewHolder(itemView);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull EventViewHolder holder, int position) {
+ Event currentEvent = getItem(position);
+ holder.bind(currentEvent, listener);
+ }
+
+ public static class EventViewHolder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
+ private final TextView titleTextView;
+ private final TextView detailsTextView;
+ private final TextView attendeesTextView;
+
+ public EventViewHolder(@NonNull View itemView) {
+ super(itemView);
+ titleTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_title);
+ detailsTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_details);
+ attendeesTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_attendees);
+ }
+
+ public void bind(Event event, OnEventClickListener listener) {
+ titleTextView.setText(event.getTitle());
+ detailsTextView.setText(event.getDetails());
+ attendeesTextView.setText(String.format("Attendees: %d/%d",
+ event.getAttendeesAmount(), event.getMaximumAttendees()));
+
+ itemView.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ if (listener != null) {
+ listener.onEventClick(event);
+ }
+ });
+ }
+ }
+
+ public interface OnEventClickListener {
+ void onEventClick(Event event);
+ }
+}

+package com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.fragments;
 
+import android.os.Bundle;
+import android.view.LayoutInflater;
+import android.view.View;
+import android.view.ViewGroup;
+import android.widget.ProgressBar;
+import android.widget.TextView;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
+import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
+import androidx.navigation.NavController;
+import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.adapter.EventAdapter;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel.EventViewModel;
+
+public class EventsFragment extends Fragment implements EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener {
+
+ private EventViewModel viewModel;
+ private RecyclerView recyclerView;
+ private EventAdapter adapter;
+ private ProgressBar progressBar;
+ private TextView errorText;
+ private NavController navController;
+
+ @Nullable
+ @Override
+ public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_events, container, false);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
+
+ navController = Navigation.findNavController(view);
+
+ // Initialize ViewModel
+ viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(EventViewModel.class);
+
+ // Initialize views
+ recyclerView = view.findViewById(R.id.events_recycler_view);
+ progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
+ errorText = view.findViewById(R.id.error_text);
+
+ // Setup RecyclerView
+ adapter = new EventAdapter(this);
+ recyclerView.setAdapter(adapter);
+
+ // Setup observers
+ setupObservers();
+
+ // Load events
+ viewModel.fetchEvents();
+ }
+
+ private void setupObservers() {
+ viewModel.getEvents().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), events -> {
+ adapter.submitList(events);
+
+ if (events.isEmpty()) {
+ showError("No events found");
+ } else {
+ hideError();
+ }
+
+ showContent();
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), error -> {
+ if (error != null && !error.isEmpty()) {
+ showError(error);
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private void showLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ }
+
+ private void showContent() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ recyclerView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ }
+
+ private void showError(String message) {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ errorText.setText(message);
+ }
+
+ private void hideError() {
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onEventClick(Event event) {
+ // Navigate to event details screen
+ Bundle args = new Bundle();
+ args.putString("eventId", event.getId());
+ navController.navigate(R.id.action_navigation_events_to_eventDetailFragment, args);
+ }
+}

+import android.view.View;
+import android.view.ViewGroup;
+import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
+import android.widget.Button;
+import android.widget.ProgressBar;
+import android.widget.Spinner;
+import android.widget.TextView;
+import android.widget.Toast;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
+import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
+
+import com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel.EventViewModel;
+
+import java.util.ArrayList;
+import java.util.List;
+
+public class RegisterFragment extends Fragment {
+
+ private EventViewModel viewModel;
+ private Spinner eventSpinner;
+ private TextInputEditText nameInput;
+ private TextInputEditText emailInput;
+ private Button registerButton;
+ private ProgressBar progressBar;
+ private TextView resultText;
+ private List<Event> eventsList = new ArrayList<>();
+
+ @Nullable
+ @Override
+ public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_register, container, false);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
+
+ // Initialize ViewModel
+ viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(EventViewModel.class);
+
+ // Initialize views
+ eventSpinner = view.findViewById(R.id.event_spinner);
+ nameInput = view.findViewById(R.id.name_input);
+ emailInput = view.findViewById(R.id.email_input);
+ registerButton = view.findViewById(R.id.register_button);
+ progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
+ resultText = view.findViewById(R.id.result_text);
+
+ // Setup observers and click listeners
+ setupObservers();
+ setupClickListeners();
+
+ // Load events for the spinner
+ viewModel.fetchEvents();
+ showLoading();
+ }
+
+ private void setupObservers() {
+ viewModel.getEvents().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), events -> {
+ eventsList = events;
+ setupEventSpinner(events);
+ hideLoading();
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getRegistrationResult().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), result -> {
+ hideLoading();
+ showResult(result);
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), error -> {
+ hideLoading();
+ if (error != null && !error.isEmpty()) {
+ showResult("Error: " + error);
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private void setupEventSpinner(List<Event> events) {
+ if (events == null || events.isEmpty()) {
+ showNoEventsMessage();
+ return;
+ }
+
+ // Create an array of event titles
+ String[] eventTitles = new String[events.size()];
+ for (int i = 0; i < events.size(); i++) {
+ eventTitles[i] = events.get(i).getTitle();
+ }
+
+ ArrayAdapter<String> spinnerAdapter = new ArrayAdapter<>(
+ requireContext(),
+ android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item,
+ eventTitles
+ );
+ spinnerAdapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item);
+ eventSpinner.setAdapter(spinnerAdapter);
+
+ // Enable register button since we have events
+ registerButton.setEnabled(true);
+ }
+
+ private void showNoEventsMessage() {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "No events available", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ registerButton.setEnabled(false);
+ }
+
+ private void setupClickListeners() {
+ registerButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ if (validateInputs()) {
+ registerForEvent();
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private boolean validateInputs() {
+ String name = nameInput.getText().toString().trim();
+ String email = emailInput.getText().toString().trim();
+
+ if (name.isEmpty()) {
+ nameInput.setError("Name is required");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ if (email.isEmpty()) {
+ emailInput.setError("Email is required");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ if (!android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {
+ emailInput.setError("Please enter a valid email address");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ return true;
+ }
+
+ private void registerForEvent() {
+ int position = eventSpinner.getSelectedItemPosition();
+ if (position == -1 || position >= eventsList.size()) {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Please select an event", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ return;
+ }
+
+ String eventId = eventsList.get(position).getId();
+ String name = nameInput.getText().toString().trim();
+ String email = emailInput.getText().toString().trim();
+
+ showLoading();
+ viewModel.registerForEvent(eventId, name, email);
+ }
+
+ private void showLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ resultText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ registerButton.setEnabled(false);
+ }
+
+ private void hideLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ registerButton.setEnabled(true);
+ }
+
+ private void showResult(String message) {
+ resultText.setText(message);
+ resultText.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ }
+}

+ private TextView errorText;
+ private ProgressBar progressBar;
+
+ @Nullable
+ @Override
+ public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_staff, container, false);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
+
+ // Initialize ViewModel
+ viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(AuthViewModel.class);
+
+ // Initialize views
+ loginSection = view.findViewById(R.id.login_section);
+ staffDashboard = view.findViewById(R.id.staff_dashboard);
+ emailInput = view.findViewById(R.id.email_input);
+ passwordInput = view.findViewById(R.id.password_input);
+ loginButton = view.findViewById(R.id.login_button);
+ createEventButton = view.findViewById(R.id.create_event_button);
+ manageEventsButton = view.findViewById(R.id.manage_events_button);
+ logoutButton = view.findViewById(R.id.logout_button);
+ welcomeText = view.findViewById(R.id.welcome_text);
+ errorText = view.findViewById(R.id.error_text);
+ progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
+
+ // Setup observers
+ setupObservers();
+
+ // Setup click listeners
+ setupClickListeners();
+
+ // Check if user is already logged in
+ if (viewModel.isUserLoggedIn()) {
+ showStaffDashboard();
+ } else {
+ showLoginSection();
+ }
+ }
+
+ private void setupObservers() {
+ viewModel.getUserLiveData().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), user -> {
+ if (user != null) {
+ showStaffDashboard();
+ updateWelcomeMessage(user);
+ } else {
+ showLoginSection();
+ }
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getIsLoading().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), isLoading -> {
+ if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(isLoading)) {
+ showLoading();
+ } else {
+ hideLoading();
+ }
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), error -> {
+ if (error != null && !error.isEmpty()) {
+ showError(error);
+ } else {
+ hideError();
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private void setupClickListeners() {
+ loginButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ if (validateLoginInputs()) {
+ String email = emailInput.getText().toString().trim();
+ String password = passwordInput.getText().toString().trim();
+ viewModel.login(email, password);
+ }
+ });
+
+ logoutButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ viewModel.logout();
+ showLoginSection();
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Logged out successfully", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ });
+
+ createEventButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Create event feature coming soon", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ // TODO: Navigate to create event screen
+ });
+
+ manageEventsButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Manage events feature coming soon", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ // TODO: Navigate to manage events screen
+ });
+ }
+
+ private boolean validateLoginInputs() {
+ String email = emailInput.getText().toString().trim();
+ String password = passwordInput.getText().toString().trim();
+
+ if (email.isEmpty()) {
+ emailInput.setError("Email is required");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ if (!android.util.Patterns.EMAIL_ADDRESS.matcher(email).matches()) {
+ emailInput.setError("Please enter a valid email address");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ if (password.isEmpty()) {
+ passwordInput.setError("Password is required");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ if (password.length() < 6) {
+ passwordInput.setError("Password must be at least 6 characters");
+ return false;
+ }
+
+ return true;
+ }
+
+ private void showLoginSection() {
+ loginSection.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ staffDashboard.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ hideError();
+ }
+
+ private void showStaffDashboard() {
+ loginSection.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ staffDashboard.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ hideError();
+ clearLoginInputs();
+ }
+
+ private void showLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ loginButton.setEnabled(false);
+ }
+
+ private void hideLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ loginButton.setEnabled(true);
+ }
+
+ private void showError(String message) {
+ errorText.setText(message);
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ }
+
+ private void hideError() {
+ errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ }
+
+ private void updateWelcomeMessage(FirebaseUser user) {
+ if (user != null) {
+ welcomeText.setText(String.format("Welcome, %s", user.getEmail()));
+ }
+ }
+
+ private void clearLoginInputs() {
+ emailInput.setText("");
+ passwordInput.setText("");
+ emailInput.clearFocus();
+ passwordInput.clearFocus();
+ }
+}
```

+package com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.adapter;
 
+import android.graphics.Color;
+import android.view.LayoutInflater;
+import android.view.View;
+import android.view.ViewGroup;
+import android.widget.TextView;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AttendeeResponse;
+
+public class AttendeeAdapter extends ListAdapter<AttendeeResponse, AttendeeAdapter.AttendeeViewHolder> {
+
+ public AttendeeAdapter() {
+ super(DIFF_CALLBACK);
+ }
+
+ private static final DiffUtil.ItemCallback<AttendeeResponse> DIFF_CALLBACK = new DiffUtil.ItemCallback<AttendeeResponse>() {
+ @Override
+ public boolean areItemsTheSame(@NonNull AttendeeResponse oldItem, @NonNull AttendeeResponse newItem) {
+ return oldItem.getId().equals(newItem.getId());
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public boolean areContentsTheSame(@NonNull AttendeeResponse oldItem, @NonNull AttendeeResponse newItem) {
+ return oldItem.getName().equals(newItem.getName()) &&
+ oldItem.getEmail().equals(newItem.getEmail()) &&
+ oldItem.isCheckedIn() == newItem.isCheckedIn();
+ }
+ };
+
+ @NonNull
+ @Override
+ public AttendeeViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
+ View view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext()).inflate(R.layout.item_attendee, parent, false);
+ return new AttendeeViewHolder(view);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull AttendeeViewHolder holder, int position) {
+ holder.bind(getItem(position));
+ }
+
+ static class AttendeeViewHolder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
+ private final TextView nameTextView;
+ private final TextView emailTextView;
+ private final TextView statusTextView;
+
+ public AttendeeViewHolder(@NonNull View itemView) {
+ super(itemView);
+ nameTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.attendee_name);
+ emailTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.attendee_email);
+ statusTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.check_in_status);
+ }
+
+ public void bind(AttendeeResponse attendee) {
+ nameTextView.setText(attendee.getName());
+ emailTextView.setText(attendee.getEmail());
+
+ if (attendee.isCheckedIn()) {
+ statusTextView.setText("CHECKED IN");
+ statusTextView.setBackgroundColor(Color.parseColor("#4CAF50")); // Green
+ statusTextView.setTextColor(Color.WHITE);
+ } else {
+ statusTextView.setText("NOT CHECKED IN");
+ statusTextView.setBackgroundColor(Color.parseColor("#FFC107")); // Amber
+ statusTextView.setTextColor(Color.BLACK);
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}

+package com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.fragments;
 
+import android.os.Bundle;
+import android.view.LayoutInflater;
+import android.view.View;
+import android.view.ViewGroup;
+import android.widget.Button;
+import android.widget.ProgressBar;
+import android.widget.TextView;
+import android.widget.Toast;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
+import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
+import androidx.navigation.NavController;
+import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
+
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.Event;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.adapter.AttendeeAdapter;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.util.CalendarUtils;
+import com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel.EventViewModel;
+
+public class EventDetailFragment extends Fragment {
+
+ private EventViewModel viewModel;
+ private TextView eventTitleTextView;
+ private TextView eventDetailsTextView;
+ private TextView attendeeCountTextView;
+ private Button registerButton;
+ private Button addToCalendarButton;
+ private RecyclerView attendeesRecyclerView;
+ private ProgressBar progressBar;
+ private AttendeeAdapter attendeeAdapter;
+ private NavController navController;
+
+ private String eventId;
+ private Event currentEvent;
+
+ @Nullable
+ @Override
+ public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_event_detail, container, false);
+ }
+
+ @Override
+ public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
+ super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
+
+ navController = Navigation.findNavController(view);
+
+ // Get event ID from arguments
+ if (getArguments() != null) {
+ eventId = getArguments().getString("eventId");
+ if (eventId == null || eventId.isEmpty()) {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Invalid event ID", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ navController.navigateUp();
+ return;
+ }
+ } else {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "No event selected", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ navController.navigateUp();
+ return;
+ }
+
+ // Initialize ViewModel
+ viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(EventViewModel.class);
+
+ // Initialize views
+ initViews(view);
+
+ // Setup RecyclerView
+ setupRecyclerView();
+
+ // Setup observers
+ setupObservers();
+
+ // Setup click listeners
+ setupClickListeners();
+
+ // Load event details
+ showLoading();
+ viewModel.fetchEventById(eventId);
+ viewModel.fetchEventAttendees(eventId);
+ }
+
+ private void initViews(View view) {
+ eventTitleTextView = view.findViewById(R.id.event_title);
+ eventDetailsTextView = view.findViewById(R.id.event_details);
+ attendeeCountTextView = view.findViewById(R.id.attendee_count);
+ registerButton = view.findViewById(R.id.register_button);
+ addToCalendarButton = view.findViewById(R.id.add_to_calendar_button);
+ attendeesRecyclerView = view.findViewById(R.id.attendees_recycler_view);
+ progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
+ }
+
+ private void setupRecyclerView() {
+ attendeeAdapter = new AttendeeAdapter();
+ attendeesRecyclerView.setAdapter(attendeeAdapter);
+ }
+
+ private void setupObservers() {
+ viewModel.getSelectedEvent().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), event -> {
+ if (event != null) {
+ displayEventDetails(event);
+ currentEvent = event;
+ hideLoading();
+ }
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getEventAttendees().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), attendees -> {
+ if (attendees != null) {
+ attendeeAdapter.submitList(attendees);
+ }
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getRegistrationResult().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), result -> {
+ if (result != null && !result.isEmpty()) {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), result, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
+ // Refresh attendee list after registration
+ viewModel.fetchEventAttendees(eventId);
+ // Refresh event details to update attendee count
+ viewModel.fetchEventById(eventId);
+ }
+ });
+
+ viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), error -> {
+ if (error != null && !error.isEmpty()) {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), error, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
+ hideLoading();
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private void setupClickListeners() {
+ registerButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ // Navigate to registration form
+ Bundle args = new Bundle();
+ args.putString("eventId", eventId);
+ navController.navigate(R.id.navigation_register, args);
+ });
+
+ addToCalendarButton.setOnClickListener(v -> {
+ if (currentEvent != null) {
+ CalendarUtils.addEventToCalendarToday(requireContext(), currentEvent);
+ } else {
+ Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Event data not available", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
+ }
+ });
+ }
+
+ private void displayEventDetails(Event event) {
+ eventTitleTextView.setText(event.getTitle());
+ eventDetailsTextView.setText(event.getDetails());
+ attendeeCountTextView.setText(String.format("Attendees: %d/%d",
+ event.getAttendeesAmount(), event.getMaximumAttendees()));
+
+ // Disable register button if event is full
+ if (event.getAttendeesAmount() >= event.getMaximumAttendees()) {
+ registerButton.setEnabled(false);
+ registerButton.setText("Event is Full");
+ } else {
+ registerButton.setEnabled(true);
+ registerButton.setText("Register for this event");
+ }
+ }
+
+ private void showLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
+ }
+
+ private void hideLoading() {
+ progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
+ }
+}

Hi. Here's the correct endpoints. Don't forget about my project, I hope you work in the right direction: https://github.com/beikmanv/jvevents-api.

package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.exception.ResourceNotFoundException;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AppUser;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.repository.AppUserRepository;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.AppUserService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
import org.springframework.security.core.annotation.AuthenticationPrincipal;
import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/admin")
public class AdminController {

 @Autowired
 private AppUserRepository appUserRepository;

 @Autowired
 private AppUserService appUserService;

 // Endpoint for the admin to promote a user to staff
 @PutMapping("/set-staff/{userId}")
 @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN')") // Ensure only admins can access this
 public ResponseEntity<String> setStaffStatus(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam boolean isStaff) {
 AppUser user = appUserRepository.findById(userId)
 .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException("User not found"));

 user.setStaff(true);
 appUserRepository.save(user);

 return ResponseEntity.ok("User staff status updated successfully");
 }

 @GetMapping("/check-staff")
 public ResponseEntity<String> checkIfStaff(@AuthenticationPrincipal OAuth2User principal) {
 String email = appUserService.getAuthenticatedUserEmail(principal);
 AppUser user = appUserService.getUserByEmail(email); // Now returns AppUser, not AppUserDTO
 if (user.isStaff()) {
 return ResponseEntity.ok("You are a staff member!");
 } else {
 return ResponseEntity.ok("You are not a staff member.");
 }
 }
}

package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.AppUserService;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.EventService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.security.core.annotation.AuthenticationPrincipal;
import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/users")
public class AppUserController {

 @Autowired
 private AppUserService appUserService;

 @Autowired
 private EventService eventService;

 // Get all users
 @GetMapping
 public ResponseEntity<List<AppUserDTO>> getAllUsers() {
 List<AppUserDTO> users = appUserService.getAllUsers();
 return new ResponseEntity<>(users, HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 // Get current user
 @GetMapping("/user")
 public ResponseEntity<?> getCurrentUser(@AuthenticationPrincipal OAuth2User principal) {
 String email = appUserService.getAuthenticatedUserEmail(principal);
 return ResponseEntity.ok(Map.of("email", email));
 }

 // Get a user by ID
 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<AppUserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(appUserService.getUserById(id), HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 // Delete a user by ID
 @DeleteMapping("/{id}/delete")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 appUserService.deleteUserById(id);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT);
 }

 // Get events assigned to a user
 @GetMapping("/{userId}/events")
 public ResponseEntity<List<EventDTO>> getEventsForUser(@PathVariable Long userId) {
 List<EventDTO> events = eventService.getEventsForUser(userId);
 if (events != null && !events.isEmpty()) {
 return ResponseEntity.ok(events);
 } else {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 }
 }
}

package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.EventService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

import java.util.List;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/events")
public class EventController {

 @Autowired
 private EventService eventService;

 // Get all events
 @GetMapping
 public ResponseEntity<List<EventDTO>> getAllEvents() {
 List<EventDTO> events = eventService.getAllEvents();
 return new ResponseEntity<>(events, HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 // Get event by id
 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> getEventById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 EventDTO eventDTO = eventService.getEventById(id);
 if (eventDTO != null) {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(eventDTO, HttpStatus.OK);
 } else {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 }
 }

 // Create a new event - Only staff can access this
 @PostMapping("/create")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> createEvent(@RequestBody EventDTO eventDTO) {
 EventDTO createdEvent = eventService.createEvent(eventDTO);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdEvent, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 }

 // Update event by id - Only staff can access this
 @PutMapping("/update/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> updateEvent(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody EventDTO eventDTO) {
 EventDTO updatedEvent = eventService.updateEvent(id, eventDTO);
 if (updatedEvent != null) {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedEvent, HttpStatus.OK);
 } else {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 }
 }

 // Delete event by id - Only staff can access this
 @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteEventById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 eventService.deleteEventById(id);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT);
 }

 // Other endpoints like signing up for an event remain publicly available or according to your access logic
 @PostMapping("/{id}/signup")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> signupForEvent(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String email) {
 eventService.signupForEvent(id, email);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 @GetMapping("/{id}/users")
 public ResponseEntity<List<AppUserDTO>> getUsersForEvent(@PathVariable Long id) {
 List<AppUserDTO> users = eventService.getUsersForEvent(id);
 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 }
}

package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.exception.ResourceNotFoundException;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AppUser;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.repository.AppUserRepository;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.AppUserService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
import org.springframework.security.core.annotation.AuthenticationPrincipal;
import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/admin")
public class AdminController {

 @Autowired
 private AppUserRepository appUserRepository;

 @Autowired
 private AppUserService appUserService;

 // Endpoint for the admin to promote a user to staff
 @PutMapping("/set-staff/{userId}")
 @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN')") // Ensure only admins can access this
 public ResponseEntity<String> setStaffStatus(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam boolean isStaff) {
 AppUser user = appUserRepository.findById(userId)
 .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException("User not found"));

 user.setStaff(true);
 appUserRepository.save(user);

 return ResponseEntity.ok("User staff status updated successfully");
 }

 @GetMapping("/check-staff")
 public ResponseEntity<String> checkIfStaff(@AuthenticationPrincipal OAuth2User principal) {
 String email = appUserService.getAuthenticatedUserEmail(principal);
 AppUser user = appUserService.getUserByEmail(email); // Now returns AppUser, not AppUserDTO
 if (user.isStaff()) {
 return ResponseEntity.ok("You are a staff member!");
 } else {
 return ResponseEntity.ok("You are not a staff member.");
 }
 }
}
package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.exception.ResourceNotFoundException;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AppUser;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.repository.AppUserRepository;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.AppUserService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.security.access.prepost.PreAuthorize;
import org.springframework.security.core.annotation.AuthenticationPrincipal;
import org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/admin")
public class AdminController {

 @Autowired
 private AppUserRepository appUserRepository;

 @Autowired
 private AppUserService appUserService;

 // Endpoint for the admin to promote a user to staff
 @PutMapping("/set-staff/{userId}")
 @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN')") // Ensure only admins can access this
 public ResponseEntity<String> setStaffStatus(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam boolean isStaff) {
 AppUser user = appUserRepository.findById(userId)
 .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException("User not found"));

 user.setStaff(true);
 appUserRepository.save(user);

 return ResponseEntity.ok("User staff status updated successfully");
 }

 @GetMapping("/check-staff")
 public ResponseEntity<String> checkIfStaff(@AuthenticationPrincipal OAuth2User principal) {

 AppUser user = appUserService.getUserByEmail(email); // Now returns AppUser, not AppUserDTO
 if (user.isStaff()) {

package com.northcoders.jvevents.controller;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.dto.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.EventService;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

import java.util.List;

@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/events")
public class EventController {

 @Autowired
 private EventService eventService;

 // Get all events
 @GetMapping
 public ResponseEntity<List<EventDTO>> getAllEvents() {
 List<EventDTO> events = eventService.getAllEvents();
 return new ResponseEntity<>(events, HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 // Get event by id
 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> getEventById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 EventDTO eventDTO = eventService.getEventById(id);
 if (eventDTO != null) {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(eventDTO, HttpStatus.OK);
 } else {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 }
 }

 // Create a new event - Only staff can access this
 @PostMapping("/create")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> createEvent(@RequestBody EventDTO eventDTO) {
 EventDTO createdEvent = eventService.createEvent(eventDTO);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdEvent, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 }

 // Update event by id - Only staff can access this
 @PutMapping("/update/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<EventDTO> updateEvent(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody EventDTO eventDTO) {
 EventDTO updatedEvent = eventService.updateEvent(id, eventDTO);
 if (updatedEvent != null) {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedEvent, HttpStatus.OK);
 } else {
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 }
 }

 // Delete event by id - Only staff can access this
 @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteEventById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 eventService.deleteEventById(id);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT);
 }

 // Other endpoints like signing up for an event remain publicly available or according to your access logic
 @PostMapping("/{id}/signup")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> signupForEvent(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String email) {
 eventService.signupForEvent(id, email);
 return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.OK);
 }

 @GetMapping("/{id}/users")
 public ResponseEntity<List<AppUserDTO>> getUsersForEvent(@PathVariable Long id) {
 List<AppUserDTO> users = eventService.getUsersForEvent(id);
 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 }
}

package com.hampshirewolves.aeroatlas.repository;

import android.app.Application;
import android.util.Log;

import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;

import com.hampshirewolves.aeroatlas.model.City;
import com.hampshirewolves.aeroatlas.service.AeroAtlasApiService;
import com.hampshirewolves.aeroatlas.service.RetrofitInstance;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import retrofit2.Call;
import retrofit2.Callback;
import retrofit2.Response;

public class CityRepository {
 private List<City> cities = new ArrayList<>();
 private MutableLiveData<List<City>> citiesLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private MutableLiveData<City> singleCityLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private MutableLiveData<City> randomCityLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private AeroAtlasApiService service;
 private Application application;

 public CityRepository(Application application) {
 this.application = application;
 service = RetrofitInstance.getService();
 }

 public MutableLiveData<List<City>> getCitiesLiveData() {
 Call<List<City>> call = service.getAllCities();

 call.enqueue(new Callback<List<City>>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<List<City>> call, Response<List<City>> response) {

 List<City> cities = response.body();
 citiesLiveData.setValue(cities);
 }

 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<List<City>> call, Throwable t) {
 Log.i("GET /cities", t.getMessage());
 }
 });

 return citiesLiveData;
 }

 public MutableLiveData<City> getCityByIdLiveData(long id) {
 Call<City> call = service.getCityById(id);

 call.enqueue(new Callback<City>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<City> call, Response<City> response) {
 if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
 singleCityLiveData.setValue(response.body());
 }
 }

 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<City> call, Throwable t) {
 Log.i("GET /cities/{id}", t.getMessage());
 }
 });

 return singleCityLiveData;
 }

 public MutableLiveData<City> getRandomCityLiveData() {
 Call<City> call = service.getRandomCity();

 call.enqueue(new Callback<City>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<City> call, Response<City> response) {
 if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
 randomCityLiveData.setValue(response.body());
 }
 }

 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<City> call, Throwable t) {
 Log.i("GET /cities/random", t.getMessage());
 }
 });

 return randomCityLiveData;
 }
}

 Call<List<City>> getAllCities();

package com.hampshirewolves.aeroatlas.service;

import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
import retrofit2.Retrofit;

public class RetrofitInstance {

 private static final String Base_URL = "http://10.0.2.2:8085/api/v1/";

 public static AeroAtlasApiService getService() {
 if (service == null) {

 .baseUrl(Base_URL)
 .client(client)

 service = retrofit.create(AeroAtlasApiService.class);
 }

 return service;
 }
}

package com.northcoders.jvevents.model;

public class EventDTO {

 private int maximumAttendees;
 private int attendeesAmount;

 return id;
 }

 this.id = id;
 }
 
 public String getTitle() {
 return title;
 }

 this.title = title;
 }
 
 public String getDetails() {
 return details;
 }
 
 public void setDetails(String details) {
 this.details = details;
 }
 
 public int getMaximumAttendees() {
 return maximumAttendees;
 }
 
 public void setMaximumAttendees(int maximumAttendees) {
 this.maximumAttendees = maximumAttendees;
 }
 
 public int getAttendeesAmount() {
 return attendeesAmount;
 }
 
 public void setAttendeesAmount(int attendeesAmount) {
 this.attendeesAmount = attendeesAmount;
 }
}

3. **API Service Interface**:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.service;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.AppUserDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;

import java.util.List;

import retrofit2.Call;
import retrofit2.http.Body;
import retrofit2.http.DELETE;
import retrofit2.http.GET;
import retrofit2.http.POST;
import retrofit2.http.PUT;
import retrofit2.http.Path;
import retrofit2.http.Query;

public interface JVEventsApiService {
 
 // Event endpoints
 @GET("api/v1/events")
 Call<List<EventDTO>> getAllEvents();
 
 @GET("api/v1/events/{id}")
 Call<EventDTO> getEventById(@Path("id") Long id);
 
 @POST("api/v1/events/create")
 Call<EventDTO> createEvent(@Body EventDTO eventDTO);
 
 @PUT("api/v1/events/update/{id}")
 Call<EventDTO> updateEvent(@Path("id") Long id, @Body EventDTO eventDTO);
 
 @DELETE("api/v1/events/{id}")
 Call<Void> deleteEventById(@Path("id") Long id);
 
 @POST("api/v1/events/{id}/signup")
 Call<Void> signupForEvent(@Path("id") Long id, @Query("email") String email);
 
 @GET("api/v1/events/{id}/users")
 Call<List<AppUserDTO>> getUsersForEvent(@Path("id") Long id);
}
```

4. **Retrofit Instance**:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.service;

import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
import retrofit2.Retrofit;
import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;

public class RetrofitInstance {
 private static final String BASE_URL = "http://10.0.2.2:8080/"; // Assuming your backend runs locally
 private static JVEventsApiService service;
 
 public static JVEventsApiService getService() {
 if (service == null) {
 // Create logging interceptor
 HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
 interceptor.setLevel(HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY);
 
 // Create HTTP client with interceptor
 OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
 .addInterceptor(interceptor)
 .build();
 
 // Create Retrofit instance
 Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
 .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
 .client(client)
 .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
 .build();
 
 // Create API service
 service = retrofit.create(JVEventsApiService.class);
 }
 
 return service;
 }
}
```

5. **Event Repository**:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.repository;

import android.app.Application;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.JVEventsApiService;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.service.RetrofitInstance;

import java.util.List;

import retrofit2.Call;
import retrofit2.Callback;
import retrofit2.Response;

public class EventRepository {
 private static final String TAG = "EventRepository";
 
 private MutableLiveData<List<EventDTO>> eventsLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private MutableLiveData<EventDTO> eventByIdLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private MutableLiveData<Boolean> signupSuccessLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private JVEventsApiService apiService;
 
 public EventRepository() {
 apiService = RetrofitInstance.getService();
 }
 
 public MutableLiveData<List<EventDTO>> getEventsLiveData() {
 fetchAllEvents();
 return eventsLiveData;
 }
 
 public MutableLiveData<EventDTO> getEventByIdLiveData() {
 return eventByIdLiveData;
 }
 
 public MutableLiveData<Boolean> getSignupSuccessLiveData() {
 return signupSuccessLiveData;
 }
 
 public void fetchAllEvents() {
 Call<List<EventDTO>> call = apiService.getAllEvents();
 
 call.enqueue(new Callback<List<EventDTO>>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<List<EventDTO>> call, Response<List<EventDTO>> response) {
 if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Events fetched successfully. Count: " + response.body().size());
 eventsLiveData.setValue(response.body());
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to fetch events. Response code: " + response.code());
 }
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<List<EventDTO>> call, Throwable t) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching events", t);
 }
 });
 }
 
 public void fetchEventById(Long id) {
 Call<EventDTO> call = apiService.getEventById(id);
 
 call.enqueue(new Callback<EventDTO>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<EventDTO> call, Response<EventDTO> response) {
 if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
 eventByIdLiveData.setValue(response.body());
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to fetch event details. Response code: " + response.code());
 }
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<EventDTO> call, Throwable t) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching event details", t);
 }
 });
 }
 
 public void signUpForEvent(Long eventId, String email) {
 Call<Void> call = apiService.signupForEvent(eventId, email);
 
 call.enqueue(new Callback<Void>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<Void> call, Response<Void> response) {
 if (response.isSuccessful()) {
 signupSuccessLiveData.setValue(true);
 } else {
 signupSuccessLiveData.setValue(false);
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to sign up for event. Response code: " + response.code());
 }
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<Void> call, Throwable t) {
 signupSuccessLiveData.setValue(false);
 Log.e(TAG, "Error signing up for event", t);
 }
 });
 }
}
```

package com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel;

import android.app.Application;
import android.util.Log;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel;
import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.repository.EventRepository;

import java.util.List;

public class EventViewModel extends AndroidViewModel {
 private static final String TAG = "EventViewModel";
 
 private EventRepository repository;
 private LiveData<List<EventDTO>> eventsLiveData;
 private LiveData<EventDTO> eventByIdLiveData;
 private LiveData<Boolean> signupSuccessLiveData;
 private MutableLiveData<String> errorMessageLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 
 public EventViewModel(@NonNull Application application) {
 super(application);
 repository = new EventRepository();
 eventsLiveData = repository.getEventsLiveData();
 eventByIdLiveData = repository.getEventByIdLiveData();
 signupSuccessLiveData = repository.getSignupSuccessLiveData();
 }
 
 public LiveData<List<EventDTO>> getEvents() {
 return eventsLiveData;
 }
 
 public LiveData<EventDTO> getEventById() {
 return eventByIdLiveData;
 }
 
 public LiveData<Boolean> getSignupSuccess() {
 return signupSuccessLiveData;
 }
 
 public LiveData<String> getErrorMessage() {
 return errorMessageLiveData;
 }
 
 public void loadEvents() {
 repository.fetchAllEvents();
 }
 
 public void loadEventById(Long id) {
 repository.fetchEventById(id);
 }
 
 public void signUpForEvent(Long eventId, String email) {
 repository.signUpForEvent(eventId, email);
 }
}
```

Now, let's create an adapter for the RecyclerView:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.adapter;

import android.view.LayoutInflater;
import android.view.View;
import android.view.ViewGroup;
import android.widget.TextView;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public class EventsAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<EventsAdapter.EventViewHolder> {
 
 private List<EventDTO> eventsList = new ArrayList<>();
 private OnEventClickListener listener;
 
 public interface OnEventClickListener {
 void onEventClick(EventDTO event);
 }
 
 public EventsAdapter(OnEventClickListener listener) {
 this.listener = listener;
 }
 
 @NonNull
 @Override
 public EventViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
 View itemView = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext())
 .inflate(R.layout.item_event, parent, false);
 return new EventViewHolder(itemView);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull EventViewHolder holder, int position) {
 EventDTO currentEvent = eventsList.get(position);
 holder.titleTextView.setText(currentEvent.getTitle());
 holder.detailsTextView.setText(currentEvent.getDetails());
 holder.attendeesTextView.setText("Attendees: " + currentEvent.getAttendeesAmount() + "/" + currentEvent.getMaximumAttendees());
 
 holder.itemView.setOnClickListener(v -> {
 if (listener != null) {
 listener.onEventClick(currentEvent);
 }
 });
 }
 
 @Override
 public int getItemCount() {
 return eventsList.size();
 }
 
 public void setEvents(List<EventDTO> events) {
 this.eventsList = events;
 notifyDataSetChanged();
 }
 
 static class EventViewHolder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
 private TextView titleTextView;
 private TextView detailsTextView;
 private TextView attendeesTextView;
 
 public EventViewHolder(@NonNull View itemView) {
 super(itemView);
 titleTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_title);
 detailsTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_details);
 attendeesTextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_attendees);
 }
 }
}
```

Finally, let's create the Events Fragment:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.fragments;

import android.os.Bundle;
import android.util.Log;
import android.view.LayoutInflater;
import android.view.View;
import android.view.ViewGroup;
import android.widget.ProgressBar;
import android.widget.TextView;
import android.widget.Toast;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.adapter.EventsAdapter;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel.EventViewModel;

public class EventsFragment extends Fragment implements EventsAdapter.OnEventClickListener {
 private static final String TAG = "EventsFragment";
 
 private EventViewModel viewModel;
 private RecyclerView recyclerView;
 private EventsAdapter adapter;
 private ProgressBar progressBar;
 private TextView errorText;
 
 @Nullable
 @Override
 public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_events, container, false);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
 
 // Initialize ViewModel
 viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(EventViewModel.class);
 
 // Initialize views
 recyclerView = view.findViewById(R.id.events_recycler_view);
 progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
 errorText = view.findViewById(R.id.error_text);
 
 // Setup RecyclerView
 adapter = new EventsAdapter(this);
 recyclerView.setAdapter(adapter);
 
 // Setup observers
 setupObservers();
 
 // Load events
 showLoading();
 viewModel.loadEvents();
 }
 
 private void setupObservers() {
 viewModel.getEvents().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), events -> {
 if (events != null && !events.isEmpty()) {
 adapter.setEvents(events);
 showContent();
 } else {
 showError("No events found");
 }
 });
 
 viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), errorMsg -> {
 if (errorMsg != null && !errorMsg.isEmpty()) {
 showError(errorMsg);
 }
 });
 }
 
 private void showLoading() {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 }
 
 private void showContent() {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 }
 
 private void showError(String message) {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 errorText.setText(message);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onEventClick(EventDTO event) {
 // Handle event click - navigate to event details
 Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Clicked on: " + event.getTitle(), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
 
 // For now, we'll just log the event details
 Log.d(TAG, "Event clicked: " + event.getTitle() + ", ID: " + event.getId());
 
 // Later we can navigate to an event details screen
 // Bundle args = new Bundle();
 // args.putLong("eventId", event.getId());
 // Navigation.findNavController(requireView()).navigate(R.id.action_to_event_details, args);
 }
}
```

We need to update the MainActivity to show our fragment:

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents;

import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;

import android.os.Bundle;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.ui.fragments.EventsFragment;

public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {

 @Override
 protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
 setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
 
 if (savedInstanceState == null) {
 getSupportFragmentManager().beginTransaction()
 .replace(R.id.fragment_container, new EventsFragment())
 .commit();
 }
 }
}
```

And update the activity_main.xml layout to include the fragment container:

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:id="@+id/main"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 tools:context=".MainActivity">

 <FrameLayout
 android:id="@+id/fragment_container"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
```

Don't forget to add Internet permission in your AndroidManifest.xml:

```xml
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
```

Now, to test this, make sure your backend API is running and accessible. You'll need to update the `BASE_URL` in `RetrofitInstance.java` to point to your actual backend URL:

```java
private static final String BASE_URL = "http://YOUR_ACTUAL_API_URL/"; 
```

If you're running the backend locally and testing on an Android emulator, use `10.0.2.2` instead of `localhost`:

```java
private static final String BASE_URL = "http://10.0.2.2:8080/"; 
```

This setup should:
1. Connect to your API 
2. Fetch events
3. Display them in a recycler view
4. Show loading and error states as needed

}

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.api;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;

import java.util.List;

import retrofit2.Call;
import retrofit2.http.GET;
import retrofit2.http.Path;

public interface ApiService {
 
 // Just the event listing endpoint for now
 @GET("api/v1/events")
 Call<List<EventDTO>> getAllEvents();
 
 @GET("api/v1/events/{id}")
 Call<EventDTO> getEventById(@Path("id") Long id);
}
```

### 4. RetrofitInstance.java

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.api;

import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
import retrofit2.Retrofit;
import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;

public class RetrofitInstance {
 // Change this to your actual backend URL
 private static final String BASE_URL = "http://10.0.2.2:8080/"; 
 private static ApiService apiService;
 
 public static ApiService getApiService() {
 if (apiService == null) {
 // Create logging interceptor
 HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
 interceptor.setLevel(HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY);
 
 // Create HTTP client with interceptor
 OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
 .addInterceptor(interceptor)
 .build();
 
 // Create Retrofit instance
 Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
 .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
 .client(client)
 .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
 .build();
 
 // Create API service
 apiService = retrofit.create(ApiService.class);
 }
 
 return apiService;
 }
}
```

### 5. EventRepository.java

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.repository;

import android.util.Log;

import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.api.ApiService;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.api.RetrofitInstance;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;

import java.util.List;

import retrofit2.Call;
import retrofit2.Callback;
import retrofit2.Response;

public class EventRepository {
 private static final String TAG = "EventRepository";
 
 private final ApiService apiService;
 private final MutableLiveData<List<EventDTO>> eventsLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> isLoadingLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 private final MutableLiveData<String> errorMessageLiveData = new MutableLiveData<>();
 
 public EventRepository() {
 apiService = RetrofitInstance.getApiService();
 }
 
 public LiveData<List<EventDTO>> getEventsLiveData() {
 return eventsLiveData;
 }
 
 public LiveData<Boolean> getIsLoadingLiveData() {
 return isLoadingLiveData;
 }
 
 public LiveData<String> getErrorMessageLiveData() {
 return errorMessageLiveData;
 }
 
 public void fetchAllEvents() {
 isLoadingLiveData.setValue(true);
 
 apiService.getAllEvents().enqueue(new Callback<List<EventDTO>>() {
 @Override
 public void onResponse(Call<List<EventDTO>> call, Response<List<EventDTO>> response) {
 isLoadingLiveData.setValue(false);
 
 if (response.isSuccessful() && response.body() != null) {
 eventsLiveData.setValue(response.body());
 Log.d(TAG, "Events fetched successfully. Count: " + response.body().size());
 } else {
 errorMessageLiveData.setValue("Failed to load events: " + 
 (response.errorBody() != null ? response.code() : "Unknown error"));
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to fetch events. Response code: " + response.code());
 }
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onFailure(Call<List<EventDTO>> call, Throwable t) {
 isLoadingLiveData.setValue(false);
 errorMessageLiveData.setValue("Network error: " + t.getMessage());
 Log.e(TAG, "Error fetching events", t);
 }
 });
 }
}
```

package com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel;

import android.app.Application;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel;
import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.repository.EventRepository;

import java.util.List;

public class MainViewModel extends AndroidViewModel {
 private final EventRepository repository;
 
 public MainViewModel(@NonNull Application application) {
 super(application);
 repository = new EventRepository();
 }
 
 public LiveData<List<EventDTO>> getEvents() {
 return repository.getEventsLiveData();
 }
 
 public LiveData<Boolean> isLoading() {
 return repository.getIsLoadingLiveData();
 }
 
 public LiveData<String> getErrorMessage() {
 return repository.getErrorMessageLiveData();
 }
 
 public void loadEvents() {
 repository.fetchAllEvents();
 }
}

### 7. EventsAdapter.java

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.adapter;

import android.view.LayoutInflater;
import android.view.View;
import android.view.ViewGroup;
import android.widget.TextView;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public class EventsAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<EventsAdapter.EventViewHolder> {
 
 private List<EventDTO> events = new ArrayList<>();
 private final OnEventClickListener listener;
 
 public interface OnEventClickListener {
 void onEventClick(EventDTO event);
 }
 
 public EventsAdapter(OnEventClickListener listener) {
 this.listener = listener;
 }
 
 @NonNull
 @Override
 public EventViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
 View view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.getContext())
 .inflate(R.layout.item_event, parent, false);
 return new EventViewHolder(view);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull EventViewHolder holder, int position) {
 EventDTO event = events.get(position);
 holder.title.setText(event.getTitle());
 holder.description.setText(event.getDescription());
 
 // Format date and location
 String dateLocation = event.getEventDate() + " at " + event.getLocation();
 holder.dateLocation.setText(dateLocation);
 
 holder.itemView.setOnClickListener(v -> {
 if (listener != null) {
 listener.onEventClick(event);
 }
 });
 }
 
 @Override
 public int getItemCount() {
 return events.size();
 }
 
 public void setEvents(List<EventDTO> events) {
 this.events = events;
 notifyDataSetChanged();
 }
 
 static class EventViewHolder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
 TextView title, description, dateLocation;
 
 public EventViewHolder(@NonNull View itemView) {
 super(itemView);
 title = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_title);
 description = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_description);
 dateLocation = itemView.findViewById(R.id.event_date_location);
 }
 }
}
```

### 11. EventsFragment.java

```java
package com.northcoders.jvevents.fragment;

import android.os.Bundle;
import android.util.Log;
import android.view.LayoutInflater;
import android.view.View;
import android.view.ViewGroup;
import android.widget.ProgressBar;
import android.widget.TextView;
import android.widget.Toast;

import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;

import com.northcoders.jvevents.R;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.adapter.EventsAdapter;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.model.EventDTO;
import com.northcoders.jvevents.viewmodel.MainViewModel;

public class EventsFragment extends Fragment implements EventsAdapter.OnEventClickListener {
 private static final String TAG = "EventsFragment";
 
 private MainViewModel viewModel;
 private RecyclerView recyclerView;
 private EventsAdapter adapter;
 private ProgressBar progressBar;
 private TextView errorText;
 
 @Nullable
 @Override
 public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 return inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_events, container, false);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
 super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
 
 // Initialize views
 recyclerView = view.findViewById(R.id.events_recycler_view);
 progressBar = view.findViewById(R.id.progress_bar);
 errorText = view.findViewById(R.id.error_text);
 
 // Setup ViewModel
 viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(MainViewModel.class);
 
 // Setup RecyclerView
 adapter = new EventsAdapter(this);
 recyclerView.setAdapter(adapter);
 
 // Observe data
 setupObservers();
 
 // Load events
 viewModel.loadEvents();
 }
 
 private void setupObservers() {
 viewModel.getEvents().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), events -> {
 if (events != null && !events.isEmpty()) {
 adapter.setEvents(events);
 showContent();
 } else {
 showError("No events found");
 }
 });
 
 viewModel.isLoading().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), isLoading -> {
 if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(isLoading)) {
 showLoading();
 }
 });
 
 viewModel.getErrorMessage().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), errorMsg -> {
 if (errorMsg != null && !errorMsg.isEmpty()) {
 showError(errorMsg);
 }
 });
 }
 
 private void showLoading() {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 }
 
 private void showContent() {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 }
 
 private void showError(String message) {
 progressBar.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 recyclerView.setVisibility(View.GONE);
 errorText.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
 errorText.setText(message);
 }
 
 @Override
 public void onEventClick(EventDTO event) {
 Toast.makeText(requireContext(), 
 "Selected event: " + event.getTitle(), 
 Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
 Log.d(TAG, "Clicked on event: " + event.getTitle());
 }
}
```
